121.content:
Your keys gave some resistance as you pushed them into the door. Frustrated and fed up, you shoved them in and opened the door to your apartment.

Chad sat on the couch, his feet up on your coffee table, playing xbox.

"What's up twerp" He said non-chalantly.

Chad was your step brother. When you two were younger, he would pick on you relentlessly, bullying you in and out of home. Now, as fate would have it, you two lived together in the same apartment. It really wasn't your decision, but with the amount of rent you could afford, you didn't really have a choice.

"Chad, I need to talk to you." You already knew this was gonna suck. You'd just lost your job and the situation made it so that you probably wouldn't be able to find another one for awhile.You couldn't move home since your parents were in a retirement home, and you really had nowhere else to go. It was time to grovel and you already felt humiliated.

"Wanna blow me or something?" Chad grinned as he responded, not taking his eyes off the TV.

You explained your situation to him, trying hard not to sound to pathetic as you asked for his help.

"... So I'm really sorry to have to ask you, but is it ok to borrow money for rent? I have enough for the next month or so, but after that I'm not really sure.."

You finished and waited for a response. The entire time you were speaking, chad hadn't looked away from the screen. After about 10 seconds, you could feel your skin warming up from the embarassment. Finally he spoke.

"Fine."

You were totally surprised, and started thanking him in excess.

"You're gonna have to do anything I say though, from now on."

Not really sure what he meant, you instantly agreed. Doing some extra laundry and dishes wouldn't be an issue, you were just happy you didn't have to be homeless. You began to leave, exhausted and ready to sleep, when you were cut off.

"Not so fast, twerp...

You took his foot in your hand and began kneading the ball underneath the toes. Chad resumed his video games and you focused on rubbing his foot. After about a minute, he put his other foot on your shoulder.

132.content:
You find one of your co-workers, Matt, staring at you. Usually it's the other way around since he is basically the definition of perfection and hotness. His creamy skin is smooth and flawless. His golden hair is cut short and sexy. His eyes are the color of the ocean, and you wouldn't mind drowning. When the boss calls him to do something, he is forced to walk past you. But as he walks past you, you feel his hand slapping your ass lightly and smell his deadly flatulence. He glances back at you with a devilish grin as he continues walking.

After work, when everyone is gone and you're the only two that remain, you feel two soft succulent lips brushing your neck, and there is a rotten smell in the air as well as the wet ripping sound of farts.

You sigh and repeat his question. "What's it gonna take to keep anyone else from finding out?"

141.content:
Sitting in a chair typing away was Brick. Recently Brick had been hired by an upscale computer company that operated almost entirely online. The only problem was the job didn't pay very well, what the company didn't know that in his spare time Brick was a hacker and had been stealing money from the company right under their noses.

As he ripped off his employers Brick also had a small window filled with some erotic cartoons in the corner. He was something of a man child, he still enjoyed cartoons and that translated into the type of porn he watched. Then a giant dominatrix came on screen, Brick groaned then closed the window, he hated the look of larger women even in cartoon form. Suddenly a bolt of lightning of an odd color struck his computer causing it to spark uncontrollably. He walked towards it carefully. Just then the screen focused on the cartoony bedroom that was in the background of the cartoon her was watching, then the pudgy face of the fat dominatrix came on screen staring at Brick.

"You're coming with me, shrimp!" She said as her hand came through the computer screen and grabbed Brick. She pulled him hard at the computer, and as soon as he touched the screen he fell what seemed like a couple of stories and landed on some cheap shag carpet. Remarkably he wasn't hurt by the large fall. Before he could consider how lucky he was he felt the Earth shaking around him, he turned around to see the dominatrix looking down at him with hungry eyes. As Brick got a good look at this woman he noticed that she was comically over sized over ten feet high and six foot wide. Her butt was massive and her breast matched. She was wearing a black corset and white panties. Her hair was pitch black and in a ponytail. Her skin was very tan as well.

"So glad you could make it slave, I'm gonna have so much fun with you." She said walking towards Brick. He backed up until he was in a corner. "I am not your slave!" He said scared. "Oh yes you are! That is unless you want an anonymous email to be sent to your boss about your thieving actions. He has an awful lot of connections, you could spend the rest of your life in prison!" She said smirking. Brick hated that he was backed into a corner, literally and figuratively. "What do you want from me?" He asked. "Easy! I want you to be my slave forever! Do whatever I say! And worship my body and all that comes from it." She said now standing directly over Brick.

Brick didn't want to do any of that, but choosing between prison or a fat female owner he chose the lesser of the two evils, or so he thought. "Alright since those are my only two options, ... I'll be your slave." He said meekly. "Yes! Great choice! Hey, check this out!" She said raising her barefoot above Brick and brought it down. He was crushed instantly but something was weird, he was still alive, but he felt lots of pressure and couldn't move. He then saw light and then the dominatrix's face. "Surprised? You may look the same but your body has undergone some changes, your in the cartoon world now which means you run on toon logic." She said holding a mirror in front of him revealing his real body crushed flat into a footprint on the cartoon floor.

Just then the dominatrix slammed her foot back down on Brick grinding in a cheesy scent. She squeezed her toes as Brick's face was lodged between them. "I'm Helga by the way." She said enjoying her new slave's groans.

What Happens Next?

152.content:
You are a 19 years old, yolo type of guy who sometimes loves to do stupid, dangerous things just to raise your adrenaline level. You saw some videos on youtube how easy it is to actually remove the tag from the clothes so you came up with the great idea of you trying it out for yourself… just for fun! You never did anything illegal or any misdemeanor thing before as you didnt like the idea of causing damage to others but... ’Just for once’ – You said to yourself. It was spring and there were a lot of sales on winter coats and you really liked one of them… one of the most expensive one, however your parents didnt give you any money for it. You were also not a fan of working so… ’what else could I do, honestly?!’ – you thought.

You went to the store and picked up your coat and some other stuff to „try them out” in one of the changing rooms. After you searched the coat, you found 2 tags which you could easily remove with your magnet, then you tried your best to fold it and just put it in you backpack. You were really scared and excited at this point, you put back the other clothes then head towards the exit…

There were 2 girls at one pay desk, one of them, the good looking ginger was looking at you as you are walking towards the exit. You had a bad feeling in your gut but you kept going, you look back at her as you walk by her and just say goodbye. You were literally sweating, you felt like your heart was beating in your throat as you walked through the gate. You’ve never felt so relieved in your life as when you passed those gates... However you heard a very silent „excuse me” as you exit. It was the ginger saying to her co-worker, who was on her phone at the time, before she started to run towards you...

„Hey! Stop!” She said as she touched your shoulder. „Show me your backpack! Where is the coat?”

You were shocked for a bit, you didnt know what to say for a second… The best you could come up with was: „Wh… What do you mean?” …

„Don’t play stupid you idiot, your backpack bulges like its about to rip and you didnt put back the coat, i saw it!” – It seems like she knew everything, you were busted but you still tried to find a way out…

„Because I left it in the changing room?! Twat… I’m outside now anyway, I dont think you have ANY right to look into my backpack… not like I stole anything so get the hell out of here before I report you!” – You were just hoping she would not have the confidence to keep pushing you after this. She just looked so cute and shy… before you annoyed her up. You thought she would just not have the bravery... but you were never so wrong in your life.
152.title: You just made a huge mistake.

choices: You go to the park as she ordered...
You go to the park but you are late...
1521.content:
„Do you really want me to make a scene here and humiliate you in front of everyone?! Do you want me to call the cops?!” She threatened you… and it was extremely effective. She didnt back out and if your parents would know about this, they would probably kill you…

„I…” – You got scared, you couldnt even keep the eye contact with her in your shame. You looked down, then at her co-worker if she is watching but luckily she was still on her phone, then you looked back at her again for a split second… „Please dont call the cops. I… I promise ill take it back right away! Please, my mother would kill me is she knew…” – You say, begging her to keep this as discreet as possible while she had a little grin on her face, knowing she won and she has you now…

„You would fucking deserve it to be honest! But you know what… take the coat.” – She said.

What the hell, why would she let you keep it? - you thought. „What?”

„Keep it, you pig. The gates are not working for like 2 weeks now and you are the fourth one already. I reported all of them, saved like 500 bucks for this store and I didnt even get a thank you, or good job. Fuck this place!” – She said... 'Huh, that was all? Am I saved?!' - you thought.

„I… Thank you” You said, as you comprehend what is happening… „wow, what an asshole management, Im so sorry for that!” – You try to be as friendly as possible, trying to agree with her but in reality you could only thank those asshole managers…

„Oh, don’t think I’m done with you! You will meet me at the park, near the gym tonight, 8 p.m.”

„Emm what? I dont think I walk there…” You start, trying to play stupid again but she interrupts you: „Oh my god, are you really this slow?! I didn’t let you go, you are still mine! The store still has the footage and I can report this whenever I want, understood?!” – She completely took control over the situation and now you feel like you are literally forced to agree to anything she wants.

„Im sorry, im sorry. I… Ill be there as you say. Im still a bit shaken and I cou…”

„I dont care. Now give me your ID and phone number…” – She ordered. You were just standing there, looking at her charming green eyes and her beautiful, long red hair. You just couldnt believe what is happening right now. 'Is she really going to blackmail me now? What does she have in mind?!' - you were wondering. For now you couldnt do anything but to obey her...

"Look, you dont have to do this... You can just tell me whatever you want and Ill do it, I promise!" As you really didnt like the idea of beeing blackmailed no matter how charming she is, you pleaded but she was cold... maybe you shouldnt have annoyed her in the first place? ...

"Shut up!" She said as she took pictures of everything… „Good, now fuck off pig. And dont be late!” – This ginger went from cute and shy to scary and dominant in only a couple of minutes…
1521.title: She takes complete control over the situation...

info.brief_description: You're blackmailed into being a slave for someone! (+100 GP for each chapter of content)
info.description:
Somebody, anybody has caught you doing something pretty humiliating or illegal! You would die if someone were to find out and the person knows that. So they do the best thing, blackmail you into being their slave. It's either that or being found out and you know being found out is the worst case scenario. What you don't realize is how awful this torture is going to be.

Anyone can blackmail, from family to friends to strangers, co-workers, and even cartoon characters. Go wild, nothing is off limits! The only thing not allowed is death and vore. Other than that, have fun!

Allowed:
Farting
Scat
Feet
Armpits
Ass
Sex
General smelliness and muskiness

Not Allowed:
Death
Gore
Vore

If you're not sure about something, please note me. Most of all, HAVE FUN!!!
GP rewards for chapters!
